attrs.script:
if "@@{calm_environment_name}@@".startswith("AZ01"):
    api_fqdn = "@@{AZ01_PC}@@"
    print("PC_API_FQDN={}").format(api_fqdn)
    exit(0)
elif "@@{calm_environment_name}@@".startswith("AZ02"):
    api_fqdn = "@@{AZ02_PC}@@"
    print("PC_API_FQDN={}").format(api_fqdn)
    exit(0)
else:
    print("ERROR: Unable to retrieve Prism Central details - exiting...")
    exit(1)

env_name = "@@{calm_environment_name}@@"
x = env_name.split("-")
if "@@{Replication}@@" == "Async":
  sync_class = "Bronze"
  category_name = x[0]+"-DR-"+sync_class+"-"+x[2]
  category_value = "RPO1h"
  print("CategoryName={}".format(category_name))
  print("CategoryValue={}".format(category_value))
  exit(0)
elif "@@{Replication}@@" == "Sync":
  sync_class = "Gold"
  category_name = x[0]+"-DR-"+sync_class+"-"+x[2]
  category_value = "RPOZero"
  print("CategoryName={}".format(category_name))
  print("CategoryValue={}".format(category_value))
  exit(0)
elif "@@{Replication}@@" == "None":
  print('INFO: Replication set to None - skipping Category definition')
  exit(0)
else:
  exit(1)

cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
disable_root: False
ssh_pwauth: True
hostname: @@{name}@@
fqdn: @@{name}@@

users:
  - name: '@@{CRED_OS.username}@@'
    lock_passwd: false
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']
    plain_text_passwd: '@@{CRED_OS.secret}@@'

runcmd:
  - [sudo, systemctl, restart, network]
  - [sudo, systemctl, mask, cloud-init-local, cloud-init, cloud-config, cloud-final]
  - [eject]

package_upgrade: false

attrs.script:
if '@@{Replication}@@' == 'None':
  print('INFO: Replication set to None - skipping Category definition')
  exit(0)

api_fqdn = '@@{PC_API_FQDN}@@'
api_user = '@@{PC_API_USER}@@'
api_pass = '@@{PC_API_PASS}@@'
vm_details = json.loads('''@@{platform}@@''')
vm_uuid = vm_details['metadata']['uuid']
category_name = '@@{CategoryName}@@'
vm_details['metadata']['categories']['@@{CategoryName}@@'] = '@@{CategoryValue}@@'
del vm_details['status']
payload = vm_details
headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Accept': 'application/json'}
url = 'https://{}:9440/api/nutanix/v3/vms/{}'.format(api_fqdn,vm_uuid)

resp = urlreq(url, verb='PUT', auth='BASIC', user=api_user, passwd=api_pass, params=json.dumps(payload), headers=headers)
if resp.ok:
    result = json.loads(resp.content)
    print('SUCCESS: Assigned VM {} to category {}:{}').format(vm_details['spec']['name'],category_name,'@@{CategoryValue}@@')
    exit(0)
else:
    print resp
    print('ERROR: Unable to assign VM to category')
    exit(1)
